Synopsis This definitive documentary about the World Cup will show you the emotions, goals and tense moments of the World of Germany Copa in 2006. Containing interviews with legends of football as Fabio Cannavaro and Michael Ballack, sequences never so much views from inside as from outside of the field, World Fifa 2006 Copa is a DVD that can not miss in the house of passionate fans by football!
